description: Neural Network hyperparameter search space (based on Colab Cell 3)

num_layers.description: Number of hidden layers in the neural network
num_layers.notes: Typical range: 1-4 layers for most datasets

neurons.description: Number of neurons per hidden layer
neurons.notes: Larger networks (512) for complex datasets, smaller (64-128) for simple ones

activation.notes: relu:  most common, fast; tanh: for normalized data; elu: smoother gradients

optimizer.notes: adam: adaptive, good default; rmsprop: for RNNs; sgd: simple, needs tuning

learning_rate.notes: Log scale search. Typical:  0.001. Lower for stability, higher for speed.

batch_size.description: Number of samples per gradient update
batch_size.notes: Smaller batches (32-64) for better generalization, larger (128-256) for speed

dropout.notes: 0.0 = no dropout, 0.3-0.5 = strong regularization. Prevents overfitting.

l2_reg.notes: Log scale search. Adds penalty for large weights.  Prevents overfitting.

num_pca_components.description: Number of PCA components for dimensionality reduction
num_pca_components.notes: Range is dataset-specific. Set in default_config.yaml or auto-detected.

isolet.notes: ISOLET: 617 features, 26 classes. Higher PCA range for complex acoustic features.

fashion_mnist.notes: Fashion-MNIST: 784 features, 10 classes. Wide PCA range for image data.

secom.notes: SECOM: 590 features, 2 classes, highly imbalanced. Moderate PCA range.

steel_plates.notes: Steel Plates:  27 features, 7 classes. Narrow PCA range (few features).

encoding_info.description: Information about how hyperparameters are encoded in chromosomes
encoding_info.notes: Chromosomes use normalized [0, 1] encoding. Decoding maps to actual values.
encoding_info.discrete: Encoded as float in [0, 1], decoded to integer in [min, max]
encoding_info.continuous: Encoded as float in [0, 1], decoded with scale (linear or log10)
encoding_info.categorical: Encoded as float in [0, 1], decoded to index in values list
